Title: Relates to providing additional reimbursement to school districts for expenses incurred for failure to receive timely payments of state aid
Summary: Relates to providing additional reimbursement to school districts for expenses incurred for failure to receive timely payments of state aid, including expenses relating to interest payments and ancillary expenses incurred as a result of not having received aid in a timely manner.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing additional reimbursement to school districts for expenses incurred for failure to receive timely payments of state aid
